channel.description: The latest CVEs for Meks -- all

item.title: CVE-2024-33694|2024-04-26T12:43:50.951Z -- Meks -- Meks ThemeForest Smart Widget
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Meks Meks ThemeForest Smart Widget allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Meks ThemeForest Smart Widget: from n/a through 1.5.

item.title: CVE-2024-33693|2024-04-26T12:44:57.737Z -- Meks -- Meks Smart Social Widget
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Meks Meks Smart Social Widget allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Meks Smart Social Widget: from n/a through 1.6.4.
